This song is very neatly written with soothing music and very catchy lyrics. “Attention” song is one of my favourites. Meaning of song Attention : This depicts that even after their breakup the girl is all over boy’s mind and life. She reminds him of the time when they were together. Boy says that the girl just wants his attention and not his love, he assumes that she might not like if he’ll date someone else. She goes to every party possible in LA, as she knew she might find the boy in one of them. Boy simply doesn't like this.
